SELECT cbidx, title, content, writer, CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, write_date, NOW()) <= 0 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, write_date, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, write_date, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, write_date, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, write_date, NOW()), '시간 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, write_date, NOW()) < 30 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, write_date, NOW()), '일 전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, write_date, NOW()), '달 전') END AS write_date, modify_yn, CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, modify_date, NOW()) <= 0 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, modify_date, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, modify_date, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, modify_date, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, modify_date, NOW()), '시간 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, modify_date, NOW()) < 30 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, modify_date, NOW()), '일 전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, modify_date, NOW()), '달 전') END AS modify_date, scrap_cnt, reply_cnt, img_system, hit_cnt, c.midx, profile_system FROM community_board c INNER JOIN member m ON c.midx = m.midx WHERE cbidx= #{cbidx} AND c.del_yn = 'N'
